summary: This is the Chinese translated version of the original Amethyst Hollows Dreamworld mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Amethyst Hollows Dreamworld mod. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18575#content
All credit to the original author AmethystDeceiver.

Introduction
Amethyst Hollows is a large residential estate that exists in a dreamworld which can only be accessed by consuming a hallucinogenic potion called Amethyst Torpor.
Amethyst Hollows contains interactive features such as a functional shooting range and dynamically switchable scenery, as well as player-clone re-skinnable mannequins.

For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.

Installation
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.This is only the esp file,please go to the original page to download the main file.

Credit
All credit with AmethystDeceiver, thank him for this great MOD!
If you like this MOD, please endorse the author and vote for it, thank you!

About our group
DRAGON SLAYER MOD TEAMâ„¢ is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: dsmod@yahoo.cn
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: N30
